DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine weather Ginkgo biloba standardize extract ( 24 % ginkoflavonoglicozides 6 % terpene ) effective treatment cognitive concentration impairment
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Ginkgo Biloba Extract Mild Cognitive Impairment Cerebrovascular Insufficiency
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion cerebrovascular insufficiency MNSE > 20 . 90 patient divide three group randomly . First group administer 120 mg ginkgo biloba extract , second group 60 mg extract third group administer placebo period 6 month . Methods use evaluation SCAG , MMSE , MDRS , VFT , CGI , TCD color Doppler carotid artery . Methods use follow safety include : routine blood test , biochemical test , neurologic physical examination , vital sign ECG .
DOC.criteria: cerebrovascular insufficiency mild cognitive disorder ( MMSE=2028 ) pregnancy cognitive disorder cause psychological , metabolic endocrine nutritional heart disorder alcohol drug abuse
